name: Blockafella
description:
Blockafella is a puzzle game where you must traverse down a grid of blocks and destroy as many as possible. Starting with only 10 moves you need to collect power ups too to keep going. The randomly generated level makes every game different and the different power ups keep the game interesting!

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move

Power ups:

- Yellow (+6 moves)

- Red (clear line)

- Pink (+5 points)

- Green (x2 moves)
